thread.title: DJs.com Secures Agreement With Dubset to Launch Fully Compliant Platform for Online Mix Streaming
thread.title_full: DJs.com Secures Agreement With Dubset to Launch Fully Compliant Platform for Online Mix Streaming - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: DJs.com Secures Agreement With Dubset to Launch Fully Compliant Platform for Online Mix Streaming
text:
DJs.com, LLC
DJs.com will launch its new mix and remix streaming platform on January 1, 2016 powered by Dubset's MixBANK™.
NEW YORK , Oct. 14, DJs.com, a new music streaming service focused on offering mix and remix content to consumers is poised to be the first fully compliant platform DJs can use to clear and share their mixes with the world while ensuring both content owners and consumers remain satisfied. At launch, streaming will be available through the DJs.com web portal and native iOS mobile application.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151013/276653LOGO
DJs.com will utilize Dubset's MixBANK™ platform to power their new service. MixBANK™ provides a turn-key registration, identification, rights resolution, and royalty management service to DJs, labels, publishers, and music services. Dubset is focused on providing the music industry tools that identify and clear copyright protected content. Once a track is cleared for use by its label and publisher, it may be used by DJs in the creation of mixes and remixes that can then be streamed on an authorized music service like DJs.com. This provides complete content control and compliance to the DJ and rights holders while creating important new royalties for the music industry.
DJs.com will become what the industry is desperately missing, the central hub for artists to share content with their fans. The DJs.com platform provides an exciting new experience for the consumer enabling innovative search options, selecting music by artist, genre, and venue with the additional capability to seamlessly purchase tickets. There is also a fully integrated social media component providing an outlet for DJs and influential industry members to voice their opinion and directly connect with their fans. For the first time consumers will know they are supporting their favorite artists as DJs earn new income through the DJ revenue share program.
Copyright infringement is a major issue facing the DJ and dance community. Millions of mixes and remixes are being taken down from popular sites for lack of proper approvals and clearance. "We are very excited about our launch. The DJ community is in search of a reliable platform where they do not have to worry about their content being taken down. We believe we have developed their new home," says Nick Steinman, president of DJs.com. "By utilizing MixBANK™ we will be able to deliver incredible volumes of great new content along with the hundreds of thousands of mixes already registered by the world's top DJs."
About DJs .com, LLC
DJs.com Holdings, LLC provides internet radio services in the United States . The company's platform allows DJs and producers to stream their mix and remix content through web and mobile applications to users who are able to browse by artist, genre, popularity or direct search. DJs.com tracks play session analytics and through a partnership with Dubset Media Holdings pays out royalties to all underlying rights holders. In addition, the company acts as a centralized hub for the DJ industry providing services for fans and artists alike. Users can explore events which have been listed by venues, promoters or artists and seamlessly purchase tickets while the editorial section provides an outlet for influential industry members to voice their opinion and directly connect with their target market. DJs.com Holdings, LLC was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in New York .
About Dubset Media Holdings, Inc.
Dubset Media Holdings (Dubset) is an innovative technology and rights management company, solving the issues associated with clearing and distributing music and video derivative content. Within music, Dubset's has developed MixBANK™, a turn-key platform for the registration, protection, and distribution of mix and remix content. Utilizing MixSCAN® to identify tracks, artists, and rights holders contained within mixes and remixes, MixBANK™enables all rights holders to clear their content for legal streaming. Once cleared, content is ready for distribution to any authorized music service. Finally, MixBANK™ handles all royalty appropriation to labels, publishers, and DJs on behalf of the music service. Led by the top DJs in the world, MixBANK™ is the home for content representing over 90% of the world's top DJs.
